summary: A simple bat file that adds weapons and armor for dragonslayers.
descriptionHtml:
Open the console and type in \"bat asdf\" (no quotation marks)
A bat file that gives you
Dragonbane
The Longhammer with FIre and Frost Damage
Daedric Armor With Fortify Health and regen health
Daedric Helmet With Fortify Shouts and Fortify Heavy Armor
Daedric Gauntlets With fortify Two-handed and One-handed
Daedric Boots With Resist Fire and Frost
Daedric Shield With Regen Stamina and Fortify Stamina
Also add the Dragon Priest mask Otar for some extra Fire/Frost/Shock defense if you want it instead.
author: assassinsftw78
